gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Celtics 119, Mavericks 110
gameRecap.excerpt: The Celtics defeated the Mavericks, 119-110. Jayson Tatum recorded 39 points, 11 rebounds, and five assists for the Celtics, with Jaylen Brown adding 34 points and four assists in the victory. Luka Doncic tallied his seventh triple double this season (33 points, season-high 18 rebounds, and 13 assists) for the Mavericks in the losing effort. The Celtics improve to 34-10, while the Mavericks fall to 24-19.
